name: Halloween Birthday Party Printables
description:
This HALLOWEEN BIRTHDAY Custom Party Printable Collection is perfect for a child, boy or girl, fall birthday party or Halloween birthday party!

INCLUDED IN THIS LISTING
This Collection includes the following Printable PDF files:

1. WRITE-IN INVITATION - 4.25" x 5.5"
2. HAPPY BIRTHDAY BANNER - 5" x 7" 
3. PARTY CIRCLES {for cupcake toppers, tags, or labels} - 2"
4. BLANK FOOD TENT CARDS - 3" folded
5. "THANK YOU FAVOR" TAGS - 2"
6. DRINK FLAGS - 3" x .5"
7. "HAPPY BIRTHDAY" CAKE FLAGS - 4" x 2" + 1" x 2" 
8. JACK 'O LANTERN + GHOST STICKIES - 3"
9. WELCOME SIGN - 8" x 10"

INSTRUCTIONS
1) Purchase. 

2) Immediately upon purchase, a link to your file will be emailed to you.  Please note the link can only be activated once.  If you accidentally activate it, please contact us!

PRINTING
You have a couple different printing options:

1) Your home. 
2) A local printer, such as Office Max, Staples, Kinkos, etc. 
3) Upload to an online printer, such as VistaPrint. 

*We recommend printing on matte photo paper. For printables that include a photo, we recommend printing on a silkier finish than matte photo paper. For pop/water bottle labels, we recommend printing on full sheet waterproof or water resistant label paper that can be purchased at PlanetLabel.com. For other labels, we recommend printing on matte full sheet label paper, which can be purchased at any office supply store.

*Please keep in mind, due to ink variances in printers, there may be a slight difference between the way a color looks on your screen and how it looks when printed! 

MORE PHOTOS, INSPIRATION, + SPECIAL OFFERS
For more photos and party inspiration, please visit our full blog post: 
http://saucypants.com/blog/we-couldnt-resist/

For exclusive offers, "like" us on facebook + "follow" us on twitter + Pinterest:
http://pinterest.com/saucypants/
https://www.facebook.com/SaucyPants 
http://twitter.com/SaucyPants

PLEASE NOTE
There are items in the photos that are not included in this listing.

This item is a printable file. To open the PDF file, you will need Adobe Reader, a free download at adobe.com. 

This file is for personal and non-commercial use only. You may not share, forward, sell, or distribute this file. SaucyPants retains all rights. 

© 2012-2013 SaucyPants (copying of any or all parts of my designs is strictly prohibited).

THANK YOU
Thank you so much for your business! We can't tell you how much we appreciate it! Please do not hesitate to contact us with further questions or special requests!

description:

6.  CUSTOMIZED FAVOR TAGS - 2"
7.  CUSTOMIZED BANNER - 5" x 7"

INSTRUCTIONS:
1) Purchase.  In "Notes to Seller" at PayPal's Checkout, please include the following:

*Occasion
*Name/Age of Person you are celebrating (if applicable)
*Tent Card Text
*Place Card Text
*Print Text
*Drink Flag Text

2) Proof - Once the order is received, we will email you and work together with you to get your order just right. You will receive a proof within 1-3 business days. 

3) File Emailed - Once you are happy with the proof(s), we will email you the final file via yousendit.com!

name: Recipe Entry Credits
description:
Don't have time to enter in all of your recipes, but want ALL of your recipes online? Let SaucyPants enter in your recipes for you! 

Purchase a package, and SaucyPants will deliver recipes credits to your account.  1 recipe credit = 1 recipe entry.  

Email your recipes to kitchen {at} saucypants {dot} com or mail them to SaucyPants, LLC 7904 E Chaparral Rd #A110-160 Scottsdale, AZ 85250, including the email associated with your account.  We will enter in your recipes within 48 hours, and we will notify you when you can check your account to view your new filled recipe box!  We will deduct the number of recipes we entered from your recipe credits!  Recipe credits expire under one year.

Questions? - Click the contact page at the bottom of the screen.
